content.rendered:
Play Noob Steve like Minecraft

Noob Steve embarked on an adventure, but fell into the trap. Help and save Steve from the monsters! Build and break blocks. Create traps from hostile mobs, but save resources. Unlock new levels and skins.

Try to escape from the snowy area!

Complete all the levels and share your result with your friends. Jump over snow blocks and don’t fall into the cold ice. Compete with your friends and collect blocks to make portal. It’s time to show off your parkour skills in Christmas!
Demonstrate your talent by completing 10 different levels that are getting harder and harder.
Try to reach the portal at the end of the each level and collect blocks to construct the portal.

How to Play Noob Steve

Mouse or right joystick – Look around WASD or left joystick – Movement Space – Jump ESC Key – Pause

Create different blocks and figure out how Steve will survive this time.
Creeper, skeleton, zombie, ghost, TNT, bees, spikes and other monsters are waiting at every turn. Survival and escape of Steve is in your hands. Elevate your creative and build blocks to save Noob Steve.

Steve is an avid noob, in an adventure he was immediately attacked by an evil explosive creeper, a hostile skeleton, a stupid zombie, bees with TNT explosives, a nasty ghost, a well-aimed zombie shooter and other monsters.
Noob Steve needs you, organize escape for him to break out from this horror and help him survive.

Minecraft is a sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios. The game was created by Markus “Notch” Persson in the Java programming language. Following several early private testing versions, it was first made public in May 2009 before being fully released in November 2011, with Notch stepping down and Jens “Jeb” Bergensten taking over development. Minecraft is the best-selling video game of all time, with over 238 million copies sold and nearly 140 million monthly active players as of 2021, and has been ported to several platforms.

Also read :

  • How do you Get the Camera in Minecraft?
  • Playing Minecraft as a YUMMY Cookie cat and Helpful Ender Kitten!
  • How to download Minecraft for free?
  • What Game is Most like Minecraft?
  • Who is Herobrine in Minecraft?
